meta.title: BulkPricingRuleCollectionResponse - Models - API Reference
meta.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce bulk pricing rules API.

blocks.data: Response payload for the BigCommerce bulk pricing rules API.

items.description: Rules that offer price discounts based on quantity breaks.

quantity_min.description: The minimum inclusive quantity of a product to satisfy this rule. Must be greater than or equal to zero.

quantity_max.description: The maximum inclusive quantity of a product to satisfy this rule. Must be greater than the `quantity_min` value â€“ unless this field has a value of 0 (zero), in which case there will be no maximum bound for this rule.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Values: `price` - the adjustment amount per product; `percent` - the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; `fixed` - the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The value of the adjustment by the bulk pricing rule.

id.description: The ID of the bulk pricing rule.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
